const DUMMY_MEALS = [ { id: "m1", name: "Sushi", description: "Finest fish and veggies", price: 22.99, Myimg: "https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0047/9730/0847/products/nurserylive-g-top-4-die-hard-succulents-pack.jpg?v=1635499730", order: "View detail" }, { id: "m2", name: "Schnitzel", description: "A german specialty!", price: "PRICE-45", Myimg: "https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0047/9730/0847/products/nurserylive-combo-packs-plants-plant-pack-for-healthy-home-office-16969206595724_220x220.jpg?v=1634226261", order: "View detail" }, { id: "m3", name: "Barbecue Burger", description: "American, raw, meaty", price: 12.99, Myimg: "https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0047/9730/0847/products/nurserylive-combo-packs-plants-pack-of-3-good-luck-jade-plants-in-ceramic-pots-16969154297996_220x220.jpg?v=1634225377", order: "View detail" }, { id: "m4", name: "Green Bowl", description: "Healthy...and green...", price: 18.99, Myimg: "https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0047/9730/0847/products/nurserylive-g-top-4-die-hard-succulents-pack.jpg?v=1635499730", order: "View detail" }, { id: "m4", name: "Green Bowl", description: "Healthy...and green...", price: 18.99, Myimg: "https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0047/9730/0847/products/nurserylive-g-top-4-die-hard-succulents-pack.jpg?v=1635499730", order: "View detail" }, { id: "Healthy...and green...", price: 18.99, Myimg: "https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0047/9730/0847/products/nurserylive-g-top-4-die-hard-succulents-pack.jpg?v=1635499730", order: "View detail" }, { id: "m4", name: "Green Bowl", description: "Healthy...and green...", price: 18.99, Myimg: "https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0047/9730/0847/products/nurserylive-g-top-4-die-hard-succulents-pack.jpg?v=1635499730", order: "View detail" }, ]; const Plant = () => { const mealList = DUMMY_MEALS.map((meal) => (

{meal.name}

{meal.price}

)); return (
{mealList}
); }; export default Plant;
